Deprecated API

Contents

Deprecated Classes
de.must.dataobj.Attribute
            
de.must.wuic.InterruptableThread
          use GenericInterruptibleThread or BatchThreadControlerFrame and de.must.middle.InteruptableBatchThread instead 
de.must.print.PTouchPrinter
          too proprietary, runtime too complicated - what we want is support a suitable support of standard windows printing 
 

Deprecated Methods
de.must.wuic.ParameterDialog.createDataPrinterChooser(String, Class, ParametersForPrinting)
          use ParameterDialogWithStorage.createPrinterChooser(String, Class, ParametersForPrinting) instead 
de.must.wuic.SelectDialog.newPanel(int)
          use newPanel() without lines 
de.must.wuic.PropertyAdministration.newPanel(int)
          use newPanel() without lines 
de.must.wuic.ParameterDialog.newPanel(int)
          use newPanel() without lines 
de.must.wuic.AbstractDataListFrame.newPanel(int)
          use newPanel() without lines 
de.must.wuic.PropertyAdministration.newPanel(String, int)
          use newPanel(tabLabel) without lines 
de.must.wuic.ParameterDialog.newPanel(String, int)
          use newPanel(tabLabel) without lines 
de.must.wuic.AbstractDataListFrame.newPanel(String, int)
          use newPanel(tabLabel) without lines 
de.must.wuic.PropertyAdministration.setTabSize(int)
          not needed any more 
de.must.wuic.ParameterDialog.setTabSize(int)
          not necessary any more.
